name: nptel-assignment-solver
description: AI-powered assignment solver for NPTEL courses

scripts.build:chrome: rm -rf dist/chrome && VITE_INPUT=background vite build --mode chrome && VITE_INPUT=content vite build --mode chrome && VITE_INPUT=ui vite build --mode chrome
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf dist/firefox && VITE_INPUT=background vite build --mode firefox && VITE_INPUT=content vite build --mode firefox && VITE_INPUT=ui vite build --mode firefox
scripts.build: bun run build:chrome && bun run build:firefox
